title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; use local LLMs in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; drop local LLMs into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; embed local LLMs in JVM applications.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart to deploy Ollama and models at scale.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need local LLM inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG and question answering.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with support for C# and F#.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose templates for Ollama + Open-WebUI, Postgres, and vector DBs.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and popular models reproducibly.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot using Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma in a single repo.

title: ollama-node-red
summary: Node-RED nodes to integrate local LLMs into IoT and automation flows.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment recipe for scaling Ollama models across GPUs.
